content.html:
It’s finally and officially done! I’m now the proud holder of a Doctor of Engineering Technology degree. That means, from now on, the only correct way to address me is by starting your communication with “Dear dr. Groeneveld”.

In case that wasn’t clear: I’m kidding. Outside of academia, the title of course has little use, although it’s nice to replay certain scenes from Friends, such as the one where Ross admits to Rachel that doctors also do get sick (not to be confused with the oh doctor Geller, stop it! one).

In case you’re interested in the thesis I’ve successfully defended, this post summarizes what I’ve been up to the past five years.

As for what’s next… Well… I don’t know yet. I’ll be teaching one more semester at our local campus, and in the meantime, try to score an internal research funding scholarship as a leverage to hopefully more long-term European funds. If that doesn’t work out, there’s always software development to go back to.

That pair programmer better at least start the conversation with dr. Groeneveld, though. I could get used to this. Now I know where those delusions of grandeur as visible in author bios on books come from.

phd
content.value:
It’s finally and officially done! I’m now the proud holder of a Doctor of Engineering Technology degree. That means, from now on, the only correct way to address me is by starting your communication with “Dear dr. Groeneveld”.
In case that wasn’t clear: I’m kidding. Outside of academia, the title of course has little use, although it’s nice to replay certain scenes from Friends, such as the one where Ross admits to Rachel that doctors also do get sick (not to be confused with the oh doctor Geller, stop it! one).
In case you’re interested in the thesis I’ve successfully defended, this post summarizes what I’ve been up to the past five years.
As for what’s next… Well… I don’t know yet. I’ll be teaching one more semester at our local campus, and in the meantime, try to score an internal research funding scholarship as a leverage to hopefully more long-term European funds. If that doesn’t work out, there’s always software development to go back to.
That pair programmer better at least start the conversation with dr. Groeneveld, though. I could get used to this. Now I know where those delusions of grandeur as visible in author bios on books come from.
tags icon phd

note: I'm Wouter Groeneveld, a Brain Baker, and I love the smell of freshly baked thoughts (and bread) in the morning. I sometimes convince others to bake their brain (and bread) too.
name: Wouter Groeneveld
